contentrichtext.text: In [[telecommunication]], a '''public data transmission service''' is a [[data transmission]] service that is established and operated by a [[telecommunication]] [[administration (business)|administration]], or a recognized private operating agency, and uses a [[public data network]]. A public data transmission service may include [[Circuit Switched Data]] [[Packet switching|packet-switched]], and [[leased line]] data transmission. ==References== {{FS1037C}} [[Category:Data transmission]] [[Category:Telecommunication services]] {{telecomm-stub}}
